Title: Authorizes Medicaid reimbursement for mental health clubhouses
Summary: Defines "mental health clubhouse"; provides that the department of health, in consultation with the office of mental health, shall authorize Medicaid reimbursement for services provided by mental health clubhouses.
LawCode: Add ยง368-g, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to authorizing Medicaid reimbursement for mental health clubhouses
